title: 为什么开服显示警告 A manual (plugin-induced) save has been detected while ser...
author: Shadow‖影
txt_content:
为什么一开服，他就显示：警告   A manual (plugin-induced) save has been detected while server is configured to auto-save. This may affect performance.


求解决！！！！！！

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 没关系的，就是你设定在自动保存的时候，服务器也会保存插件信息，这样会影响一点服务器的性能，不过问题不大。
